channel.title: NPC's talking
channel.description:
I made a Christmas Event all i need now is for my santa(1552) to say "Merry Christmas!" I want him to be saying it above his head instead of in a menu type thing...
I couldn't find in in the search box thing and i think this is the right place to put it here. If theres a link to a tut then post it or whatever.. I know this a very nub question...

item.title: NPC's talking
item.dc:creator: @Tatertot3312 Tatertot3312
item.description:
@Tatertot3312 wrote:

I went through my entire NPCHandler.JAVA file and there is no npc talking…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 15, 2008, 05:29:34 pm[/size][hr][quote=“the soul, post:5, topic:250798”] if (npcs[i].npcType == ##) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = ""; } }[/quote]

Im sorry… but where do i put it?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 15, 2008, 06:48:27 pm[/size][hr][quote=“Tatertot3312”]I went through my entire NPCHandler.JAVA file and there is no npc talking…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 15, 2008, 05:29:34 pm[/size][hr][quote author=the soul link=topic=330867.msg2584008#msg2584008 date=1229383524]

if (npcs[i].npcType == ##) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = ""; } }
[/quote]

Im sorry… but where do i put it?[/quote]

Does ne1 know!?!?

Read full topic
